start.text: I am a bad, bad man.
They say odd objects attract gunfire... and that fleet sure looks pretty odd to me.
A man's gotta do what a man's gotta do.
Just like ol' times, eh, partner?

engaged.text: Big dog is off the leash.

need_help.text: Multiple bogies detected! ETA: Right the hell now!
Uh... a little help here? Anybody?
Do I gotta do everything myself?
Get your head outta your six!

pursuing.text: And there ain't nobody here to save you this time...
Nice armor. Too bad it ain't worth spit.
Don't start none, don't be none.

hull_50.text: Gettin' a lil' dicey out here!
Huah well... it's time for me to show you what I'm made of.

hull_30.text: Steppin' all over my last nerve, kiddo.
Stick your hand in the cage, and you just might lose it.

hull_90.text: When in doubt... empty your magazines.

overload.text: Anyone wanna help out an amigo?
Fryin' some wires over here, chief.

victory.text: Hmm ha ha ha ha! I ain't sure what all that fuss was about!
Hah hah! Hot damn, we are good!
